product_name: Camaro Mono Wave Wetsuit - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you use it for surfing, paddling or swimming, the men's Camaro Mono Wave wetsuit enhances your fun in the water thanks to its stretchy and warm 3mm neoprene. 3mm neoprene features a formfitting silhouette that provides freedom of movement and non-bulky comfort. Stretchy spandex sleeves enhance range of motion. Extra-durable flatlock seams won't irritate your skin. Provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Back zipper. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you use it for surfing, paddling or swimming, the men's Camaro Mono Wave wetsuit enhances your fun in the water thanks to its stretchy and warm 3mm neoprene.
